actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Concurrent resolution to condemn the Government of South Africa which has most recently evidenced its irresponsibility as a member of the international community by engaging in massive violations of the civil liberties of the people of South Africa.

summary.text: Denounces certain acts of the Republic of South Africa. Urges the President to take the strongest possible diplomatic measures against South Africa.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution to condemn the Government of South Africa which has most recently evidenced its irresponsibility as a member of the international community by engaging in massive violations of the civil liberties of the people of South Africa.
